info.title: pkDex
info.author: Insektaure
info.description: pkDex - Offline Pokedex for Switch Games
info.details:
pkDex is a comprehensive Pokemon encyclopedia (Pokedex) application that allows users to offline browse and view detailed information about Pokemon for Switch games.

Multi-Region Support: Browse Pokemon from different regions:
- Kanto
- Sinnoh
- Sinnoh Arceus
- Galar + DLC
- Paldea + DLC

Detailed Pokemon Information:
- National and Regional
- Shiny Lock
- Types
- Evolution
- Version exclusivity
- In-game locations
- Images of both standard / shiny
- Packaged low resolution images, with dynamic loading high resolution if available on the SD card

Pokemon Tracker:
- Track caught Pokemon by marking them on the list

v1.3.1
Minor Feature release - Main App :

- Tracker now use one file per region to save "_Captured_" statuses instead of a big one (faster Read / Write)

Settings menu :

- Can now select & reset per region "_Captured_" statuses instead of all regions without distinction (this cannot be undone _-for now-_)

How to Use :- 

1. Download the latest pkDex.nro and pkDexUpdater.nro (_optional, can be downloaded from the main app_)
2. Copy pkDex.nroand pkDexUpdater.nro to be inside the /switch directory on your Switch's SD Card
3. You can download the optional High Res img pack (extract on the root of the Switch' SD Card) _-recommended-_
4. Open the app (applet or takeover mode)
5. Navigate the app

v1.1.0
New Feature release - Main App :
- Update check on startup (to ensure you have the latest version -Enable by default-) (network connection needed)

New Settings menu :

Changing the settings will generate a config.ini file in the /config/pkDex directory on the Switch SD Card, which will be used to store user preferences.
